details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Shinsoku - Reinforce, Extra Strike and Boss Rush
  • Hitokiri Strike- Persist and Cooldown Cutter

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
*
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • The last skill from the Secondary Trio can be any skill of your preference
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • A 3 Boost Node combination is also possible using 2 nodes containing and 1 node containing (left at Master Level 30)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

extraContent.title: Sword Energy and Stances
extraContent.content:
Hayato has two different stances, Normal Stance and Quick Draw Stance. You can switch between stances at any time using the Beginner skill, Quick Draw

The main purpose of Normal Stance is for mobbing while Quick Draw Stance's main purpose is for bossing. Additionally, in , you gain access to a Double Jump skill and in , you gain access to a Double Tap dash skill and a Double Jump skill

Hayato also has a secondary resource called Sword Energy which certain skills consume. With Sword Energy, you also gain bonus stats depending on the amount you have

  • Killing enemies in this stance grants 5 Sword Energy
  • Each attack in this stance grants 2 Sword Energy

These skills below generate Sword Energy when used:

  • Battoujutsu Advance (1st Job)
  • Falcon's Honor (Hyper Skill)
  • Battoujutsu Zankou (5th Job)
  • Battoujutsu Ultimate Will (5th Job)

These skills cost Sword Energy to use:

  • Quick Draw (Beginner) - Costs a maximum of 100 Sword Energy, can be used when you have less than 100 Sword Energy
  • Iaijutsu Phantom Blade (5th Job)
  • Battoujutsu Ultimate Will (5th Job)

primary.name: Master of Blades
primary.shortDesc: Permanent Speed Increase 20, Maximum Speed 165, Jump 10, Katana Mastery Increase: 80%, Willpower: 30

primary.name: Shimada Heart
primary.shortDesc: Permanent Damage Increase: 0.5%, Defense: +100 Defense (Current Damage Increased: -%)
primary.desc: Grants %Damage based on your DEF stat up to a 49% Damage bonus

primary.name: Return of the Five Planets
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Momijigaoka upon use.\nCooldown 600 sec

primary.name: Quick Draw
primary.shortDesc: Max Sword Energy Cost: 100
primary.desc: Changes stances between Normal Stance and Quick Draw stance which allows you to use different skills
details:
[Normal Stance]: Works best for mobbing
  • In this stance, you gain increased %Attack, HP, MP, %Ignore DEF

[Quick Draw Stance]: Works best for single targets like bosses
  • Changing into Quick Draw stance will cost a maximum of 100 Sword Energy
  • In this stance, you gain increased %Boss Damage, Attack Speed (by 1 stage), %Stun chance, %Crit Rate
  • In 3rd job, you gain a damaging aura around you that can trigger Damage Reflect
Also permanently provides +100% Knockback Resistance in both stances

primary.name: Summer Rain
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 220%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Triggers chase cut 4 times, which attacks 15 times, +15% damage for 120 sec.\nCooldown: 120 sec.
primary.desc: Unleashes your ultimate attack
details: Skill is obtained during 4th Job Advancement
Upon using this skill, you will gain a buff that increases your %Damage
Shares a cooldown and Key Slot with

primary.name: Hitokiri Hundred Strike
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 220%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Triggers chase cut 4 times, which attacks 15 times, +15% damage for 120 sec\nCooldown: 120 sec.
primary.desc: Unleashes your ultimate attack
details: Skill is obtained during 4th Job Advancement
Upon using this skill, you will gain a buff that increases your %Damage
Shares a cooldown and Key Slot with

primary.name: Echo of Hero
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest 'A God Among Horses'
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Sanrenzan
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 5
1st Hit - Damage: 120%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 3
2nd Hit - Damage: 120%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 3
3rd Hit - Damage: 120%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Slashes forward with 3 consecutive blows
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by using the Attack Key
Shares Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot as
Can be linked with meaning that you can dash between each slash to dodge

primary.name: Blade Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Damage: 180%, Max Enemies Hit: 1 Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Quickly strikes forward dealing damage to a single enemy
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by using the Attack Key
Shares Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot as

primary.name: Surging Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 8, Damage: 75%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Dashes forward.
primary.desc: Dash forward while pushing enemies back
details: Can be used up to 4 times consecutively without any delay

primary.name: Center Ki
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Battoujutsu Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, Adds an extra jump when used in midair. Can be used 2 times back to back.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Shares Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot as
Can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Battoujutsu Dash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Dash left or right as desired.
primary.desc: Dash skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing the Arrow Key of the direction you want to go twice (Left or Right)
Shares Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot as

primary.name: Shouryuusen
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Damage: 100%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 5, Lifts enemies into air.
primary.desc: Strikes forward, lifting enemies up into the up

primary.name: Battoujutsu Advance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Duration: 15 sec, Attack Power increases by 2%, and sword energy is restored by 8 when using skills related to Battoujutsu, Attack Power Increase Stack Cooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Unleashes each learned Battoujutsu attack back to back
details: [Passive]: Permanently, when a Battoujutsu attack is used, grants a stacking %Damage buff and restores 8 Sword Energy
[Note]: The in-game tooltip states %Attack buff however it is a %Damage buff

primary.name: Quick Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Dash left or right as desired.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Jin Sanrenzan
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 9
1st Hit - Damage: 180%, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 4
2nd Hit - Damage: 180%, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 4
3rd Hit - Damage: 180%, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Slashes forward with 3 consecutive blows
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by using the Attack Key

The Attack Key will now automatically use this skill instead of
  • can still be used by assigning it to a Key Slot
Shares Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot as
Can be linked with

primary.name: Jin Blade Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 210%, Max Enemies Hit: 1 Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Quickly strikes forward dealing damage to a single enemy
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by using the Attack Key

The Attack Key will now automatically use this skill instead of
  • can still be used by assigning it to a Key Slot
Shares Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot as

primary.name: Military Might
primary.shortDesc: Max HP and Max MP: +20%, Physical Attack Power: +15, Speed: +20, Jump: +10

primary.name: Vapor Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Damage: 100%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Jumps during attack
primary.desc: Leap upwards while damaging enemies in your path
details:
Can be assigned to a Key Slot or activated by pressing the Up Key twice
  • Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys

Can be linked when used first with:
  • Shouryuusen (1st Job)
  • Whirlwind Cut (3rd Job)
  • Sanrenzan & Blade Flash Skills (1st/2nd/3rd/4th Job)
  • Dankuusen (3rd Job)
  • Hitokori Strike - Angle (4th job)
When landing there is a delay where you cannot move but if you use one of the skills above, the delay is omitted

primary.name: Katana Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Duration: 200 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Unfaltering Blade
primary.shortDesc: Critical Damage +30%

primary.name: Rising Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55, Damage: 170%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Enemies are launched into air when they are hit.
primary.desc: Slash upwards to launch enemies in front of you into the air

primary.name: Falcon Dive
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 170%, Number of Attacks: 6
primary.desc: Leap into the air and dive downwards

primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 13, 1st Hit - Damage: 260%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 4
2nd Hit - Damage: 260%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 4
3rd Hit - Damage: 260%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 4

details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by using the Attack Key

The Attack Key will now automatically use this skill instead of

Shares Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot as

primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 31, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 6
primary.desc: Blinks forward and slashes back to your previous position
details: Enemies hit will also be pulled to your position

primary.name: Whirlwind Cut
primary.shortDesc: Active Effect: MP Cost: 33, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 380%, Number of Attacks: 3, Critical When Combined with Shouryuusen: 100%
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pushing enemies forward as well
details: Attacks will become Critical Hits if attack is combined with

primary.shortDesc: Attack Boost Chance: 90%, Evasion: 35%, Damage: +6%. Damage Boost can be stacked 5 times.
primary.desc: Whenever you dodge an attack, there is a chance to gain a stacking buff that grants %Damage

primary.name: Merciless Blade
primary.shortDesc: Status Chance: 30%, 190% damage every 1 sec, Duration: 6 sec

primary.name: Warrior's Heart
primary.shortDesc: Chance: 40%, HP Recovered: 4%
primary.desc: Whenever you land a critical hit, there is a chance to recover some HP
details: HP heal bypasses all healing restrictions

primary.name: Dankuusen
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Damage: 210%, Max Enemies Hit: 6 Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Dashes forward dealing damage to enemies you pass through
details: Enemies hit with will be targeted

Can be linked when used first with:
  • Shouryuusen (1st Job)
  • Surging Blade (1st Job)
  • Falcon Dive (2nd Job)
  • Sweeping Sword (3rd Job)
  • Whirlwind Cut (3rd Job)
  • Sanrenzan Skills (1st/2nd/3rd/4th Job)
  • Hitokiri Strike (4th Job)

MP Cost: 13

2nd Hit - Damage: 330%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 4
3rd Hit - Damage: 330%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 4

The Attack Key will now automatically use this skill instead of

primary.shortDesc: Akatsuki Trace Attack Chance: 60%, Damage: 440%, Times Activated: 1
primary.desc: When , , or damages an enemy, there is a chance to deal an additional attack
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) with

primary.name: Shinsoku
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 18, Damage: 1010%, Number of Attacks: 10. Cooldown: 15 sec.
primary.desc: Slashes forward several times

primary.name: Hitokiri Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 142, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 8, Guaranteed Critical Attack, Critical Rate Increase: 45% for 40 sec, Invincibility: 3 sec\nCooldown: 90 sec
primary.desc: Swiftly dashes forward, damaging enemies in your path
details: Attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit and you become briefly invincible
On use, grants a buff that increases your %Crit Rate
While on cooldown, Hitokiri Strike becomes a different skill that allows you to dash diagonally

primary.name: Hitokiri Strike - Angle
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 48. While moving diagonally - Damage: 500%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Critical Attacks: 8\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: Swiftly dashes diagonally, damaging enemies in your path
details: Shares SP with and replaces while it is on cooldown
Attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit

primary.name: Jinsoku
primary.shortDesc: Trigger Chance: 45% after avoiding an attack, Damage Reduction: 72%, Duration: 8 sec.\nPermanently increases Avoidability by 35%
primary.desc: After dodging an attack, there is a chance to gain a buff that increases %Damage Reduction
details: Also permanently increases your %Avoidability

primary.name: Cleaver
primary.shortDesc: Defense Ignored: 35%, Damage: +30%

primary.name: Akatsuki Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, All Stats: +15%, Duration: 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Removes all abnormal status effects, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Eye for an Eye
primary.shortDesc: After you successfully dodge, you can counterattack with 350% damage against up to 6 enemies.
primary.desc: While toggled, successfully dodging will activate a counterattack damaging nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Bloodletter
primary.shortDesc: Status Chance: 50%, 280% damage every 1 sec, Duration: 6 sec
details: Increases status chance and %Damage

primary.name: Tornado Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 32, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Critical Damage: 280%, Number of Attacks: 7, Pulls in enemies with Stun Chance: 100%, Stun Duration: 10 sec
primary.desc: Twirl around while pulling in enemies
details: Has a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Sudden Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 56, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 405%, Number of Attacks: 6, Additional Debuff Damage from Party: +20%, Duration: 30 sec. Debuff applies to Boss monsters.\nCooldown: 3 sec.
primary.desc: Slashes in place dealing damage and debuffing enemies
details:
[Debuff]: Increases %Damage dealt to enemy by your party
  • Can be applied to Boss monsters
While casting, prevents you from being knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Bushido's Will
primary.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance: +50%, All Elemental Resistance: +50% permanently

hyperActive.name: God of Blades
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, ATT +50 for 30 seconds, All abnormal status and elemental resistance increased by 100.\nCooldown: 90 sec.

hyperActive.name: Falcon's Honor
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Sword Energy: +100, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 14\nCooldown: 8 sec
hyperActive.desc: Unleashes a barrage of attacks to enemies around you
details: Generates 100 Sword Energy when used

hyperActive.name: Princess's Vow
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Sengoku classes within the party

fifthMain.name: Battoujutsu Zankou
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Damage: 1705%, Number of Rush Attacks: 15, Enemies Hit: 11. Able to do 2 or more rush attacks on the same enemy.
Hayato's sword energy recovers by 700 upon use.
Invincible during casting.
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Unleashes a barrage of slashes to nearby enemies
details: You are invincible while casting
If there are few enemies, the attacks can target the same enemy again
Generates 700 Sword Energy upon use
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Iaijutsu Phantom Blade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Sword Energy Cost: 200, Successful hits grant a buff giving +20% Final Damage per stack for 30 sec.
1st Hit: Deals 315% damage to up to 15 enemies 15 times
2nd Hit: Deals 345% damage to up to 15 enemies 15 times
3rd Hit: Deals 375% damage to up to 15 enemies 15 times
4th Hit: Deals 395% damage to up to 15 enemies 15 times
5th Hit: Deals 435% damage to up to 15 enemies 15 times
details: Each successful strike grants a stacking %Final Damage buff and the attack will become more deadly
Can be used during , , or
Costs Sword Energy to cast

fifthMain.name: Battoujutsu Ultimate Will
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Sword Energy Cost: 150, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 15, Damage: 350%, Attack Duration: 30 sec, Sword Energy Absorbed: 8 for each enemy defeated.
Deals 565% damage when attacking 1 enemy and absorbs 10 Sword Energy per attack
Before disappearing, deals a final blow that attacks up to 10 enemies 15 time(s) for 1835% damage, 6 time(s) and recovers Sword Energy. Max Sword Energy Recovered: 800
Cooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Summons a gigantic god that will attack nearby enemies
details: At the end of the summon or when the Skill Key is pressed again, the summon will unleash one final attack

During the time it is summoned, each enemy attacked will absorb some Sword Energy
  • At the end of the summon, you will gain all the Sword Energy absorbed
Costs Sword Energy to cast
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Instant Slice
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500. Stab enemies for 1010% damage 3 time(s). Number of Attacks: 10. Max Enemies Hit: 15.\nCooldown: 10 sec
fifthMain.desc: Instantly slashes enemies in a large area
details: Can be used while using other skills

masteryCore.name: HEXA Rai Sanrenzan
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 13
1st Hit - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 540%, Number of Attacks: 4
2nd Hit - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 550%, Number of Attacks: 4
3rd Hit - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 560%, Number of Attacks: 4

masteryCore.name: HEXA Rai Blade Flash
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14\nMax Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 540%, Number of Attacks: 8

originSkill.name: Jin Quick Draw
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Activates 10 Chase Cuts that deal 2000% damage to up to 15 enemies 8 times then applies the Jin Quick Draw buff on Hayato for 10 seconds.
1st Strike: Activates 2 Chase Cuts that deal 1500% damage to up to 15 enemies 10 times. Recovers 100 Sword Energy upon activation.
2nd Strike: Activates 3 Chase Cuts that deal 1500% damage to up to 15 enemies 10 times. Recovers 150 Sword Energy upon activation.
3rd Strike: Activates 5 Chase Cuts that deal 1500% damage to up to 15 enemies 10 times. Recovers 200 Sword Energy upon activation.
(Jin Blade Flash 1st-3rd Strikes can be used while using some attack skills.)
Final Strike: Activates 10 Chase Cuts that deal 4800% damage to enemies within range 15 times, invincible during casting.
Cooldown: 360 sec.

meta: Hayato is a STR warrior class part of the Sengoku. Hayato also has a secondary resource called Sword Energy which certain skills consume. With Sword Energy, you also gain bonus stats depending on the amount you have. Hayato also has two stances one for mobbing and one for bossing which you can switch between at anytime
